result.title: Invitation to SnackDown Pre-Elimination Round B 2017!
result.content:
Hello CodeForces Community,

In the recently concluded SnackDown Pre-Elimination Round A, we have seen participation from over 9K teams. In total, 1469 teams who were under top 1000 ranks in the Pre-Elimination Round A have been moved to the Elimination Round and we are now ready for the Pre-Elimination Round B. The qualified teams will not be participating in the Pre-Elimination Round B. Rest of the teams who couldn't make it to Elimination Round can compete in Pre-Elimination Round B to make their way to the Elimination Round.

Joining me and arjunarul (Arjun Arul) on the problem setting panel, we have kingofnumbers (Hasan Jaddouh) as tester. The rest of the panel members include:

  • Russian Translator: CherryTree (Sergey Kulik)
  • Mandarin Translator: huzecong (Hu Zecong)
  • Vietnamese translators: VNOI team
  • Editorialist: sidhant (Siddhant Bansal)

Given below are the details of the contest.

We hope you will enjoy the problems and we welcome your feedback in the comments below.

Start Time: Wednesday, 31st May, 2017 at 21:00 HRS. (Indian Standard Time +5:30 GMT) Check your timezone here.

Duration:: 24 hrs

Contest link: https://www.codechef.com/SNCKPB17

Accepted Languages: https://www.codechef.com/wiki/list-compilers

Note: Teams in the top 1000 ranks will move to the Elimination Round. This is the final opportunity for teams to qualify for Elimination Round.

Good Luck!
